name: Stanza
description:
Stanza!
Every day, 1 title and 9 words are generated. Everyone must write a poem with 4 or less lines that uses at least 4 of the words in your poem.
Share it with your friends!
THIS GAME IS BUGGY AS HELL. IT WAS MADE IN ONE WEEK AND I HAD TO INTEGRATE WITH JAVASCRIPT AND ALSO WEBGL IS A NIGHTMARE. DON'T @ ME LOOOOL.
